Text: Thanks so much for getting this up so fast. I had my dvr set to record and it didn't record :(

If it's like the last one then it's VERY low quality and a lot of people had issues with the audio codec but I know he was working on that.

Personally I'm waiting for an HD upload, I'd only recommend this if you're looking for the smallest file size.

yes this is legit....we'd never upload fake. we even have the trusted skull.

it's tvrip so it's not SD that's all

*not hd. this is SD

also yes I think I fixed the audio issue codec thing. nobody has mentioned the issue since I tried something new so I think it's gone.
Quality? bit rate? anyone? :) Thanks for the upload anyway

Quality is more than enough, looks and sounds well, (it is not hd or close).

The only big problem I find is that the screen was cut to "fit" in a rectangular aspect ratio, it means that the black bars ate a piece of screen and everything looks closer than it really is, like if the screen were zoomed.

Thanks MrUnpopular. I've been waiting for hours for it to complete. (Actually, it just finnished - right now!) Can't wait to watch it.

The show airs Sturdays, @ 10 c, right?
